summary:
Started my professional carreer in 1986 as a project manager in product development.
Shortly after that I moved into IT,  implemented ERP as business consultant and project manager for small and global companies, e.g. Neways Electronics, Sun Electric Systems, BAe
Then ran IT infra structure projects on global scale for organisations with 20k+ employees. 
I am looking for a new opportunity, preferably in the areas where I know that I can help you, business analysis, project management and ERP consultancy.
People that know me describe me as honest, hard working, accurate, patience, although an eye for detail never forget about relations with other parts, pleasant to work with.
I get energy from situation where people encounter the benefits from the poducts or services that are the result of my work or the team that I manage.

profile_positions.description: With 30 years work experience I am a seasoned business analyst and project manager. In all these years I have had the opportunity to work on challenging assignments on local and global level, for small sized and multi national companies. This re. a broad spectrum of the IT area, from ERP implementation, and business analysis and business process modelling assignment to latest technology infra structure.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst, Project Manager

profile_positions.description: I work on several short term internal assignments.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description: Worked on various small internal assignments like participating in bids, support service desk, review CVs.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
For this customer I act as project management officer during the implementation of a company wide One SAP. The SAP program management was the responsibility of a central CSC and client team. A local manager was responsible for all site related activities and the management of third party software that interfaces with SAP. My role is to manage the resources as they are needed by the SAP team, the third party projects and their regular job. In this role I also replace the local manager during his business travel in the weekly local progress change agents and management meetings and take care of the preparation.
Regarding the early life support period I am the coordinating all the non core processes and am the liason between the local business and the teams that provide the resolution.

After this program I return to the customer to coach and assist them in gathering information and requirements for the support of information systems in the new outsourcing contract. For a short period of time the customer appoints me as their temporary configuration manager. In this role I extend the as-is high level information into a more detailed level as preparation for the implementation of a sustainable IS configuration management system and process. The next assignment is to develop a policy for uninterrupted power supply for critical business information systems. Because of my deep knowledge of the customers company I also act as a knowledge center for various new colleagues in the beginning of their assignment with this customer.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description: As a project manager I am responsible for the implementation and deployment of Celestix bPower, McAfee and IBM Tivoli. This for a global company with presence in 25+ countries, 100+ locations and about 22000 users and 1500 servers. The challenge here is that I have a multi national core team with cmembers in Canada, UK, Germany and India. For on site support I collaborate with CSC colleagues from about 70 locations world wide. Besides the standard management activities of planning, implementation and deployment coordination and reporting I am also responsible for activities regarding procurement of project required hardware and software to be installed in one of the major data centres and on 80 satellite locations.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: For Intres I manage a project to deploy about 450 PCs and laptops with Softgrid. During this project I also design the outline process for software packaging, Intres chooses for Softgrid  to enable them to quickly deploy new or revised software and to avoid software conflicts.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: For NXP I develop the new business process for the creation of technical documentation. This documentation is used by engineers during their design projects where they need to know the technical specifications of semi conductors. I start with the modeling of the current process and then conduct the requirements soliciting  phase. Finally I design the new process bases on the capabilities of the Alfresco Open Source Document Management System. According my design the application consultant builds the new system.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description: With CaseWise I model the As-Is Enterpise model for various divisions according Nuon standard achitecture frame work derived the Zachmann. After that I ammended the base configuration model with SOX requirements coming from the controlling department and migrate all existing models to this new standard. Next assignment is to create the data model in CaseWise based upon information from Word documents and Viso Diagragms. This model is the basis for the implementation of a new GIS information system for the liquid natural gas and electric infra structure owned and managed by Nuon. Next assignment is to model all the network processes and procedures for the network division and train Nuon employees to maintain the model. The last job is to do the same for their facilities unit.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description: For a new a acquired maintenance contract the customer together with CSC implements a subset of BaaN ERP software. With this Bombardier is able to use procurement, inventory, financial transactions capabilities. This enables the customer to keep track on the costs and required for overhauling and trains. During the start up phase I am responsible for all the early support activities. In just one month I train the users on the job, create customized reports and user menus. As an extra activity I advice the management in the principles and requirements regarding 2 bin systems and multi site supply distribution.
profile_positions.title: ERP Consultant

profile_positions.description: For this customer I am the project manager for the deployment of a Citrix solution on 2 major locations and 3 satellite locations with a total of about 1500 work places. The major difficulty in this project is that the core Citrix solution was not fully complete when we have to start the deployment, Also the mapping  conducted before my project is not complete and accurate. This leads to many changes that my project has to deal with. Despite all these issues my team manages to deliver a solution that improves the customer satisfaction and lower owner ship costs.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: As a project manager I am responsible for the move of about 150 servers from 2 customer data centers to 1 CSC data center. We completed this job without any major issue and a total delay of  only 15 minutes against original schedule. For this project I compose the roadmap for each server and on the migration days I act as central coordinator and problem manager.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: For C2000 I first complete the design and implementation of the Release Management Process according ITIL standards. Next I develop an inventory supply system for parts that allow engineers replace them quickly. The main part of my assignment is to sollicit business requirements for the ITIL processes C2000 have in place and to have these supported by HP Openview. After the solliciting phase the application consultant configures the software and I then perform the pre testing based on the requirements. The process owner conduct final user acceptance testing under my guidance and accept the system.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description: For this customer CSC writes the bid for the implementation of BaaN vanilla. The current system of the customer consists of customized software and heavily customized BaaN. During the bid phase I am responsible for the Distitbution and Master Data modules. After winning the bid, we start with modeling the current processes, then we map these against the BaaN software capabilities. Next step is to develop solutions to ammend changes to the currenct processes in a way that vanilla BaaN can support these as much as possible and also estimate the costs for the new processes. This leads to the conclusion as we allready did expect and told the customer so during the bidding phase that BaaN vanilla is not the solution to aim for. This makes the customer to decide to first redesign the business processes and then start with developing a new ERP system with BaaN as backbone and with customization on top of that.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst
